title: Bug 16182sef: incorrect handling of final flag results in compile error
description: Bug 16182sef: incorrect handling of final flag results in compile error 20020515+check the 'encapsulate .... in declaring class' checkboxclass Test{private final int x;Test(int y){x= y;}}write access is changed to setX(y);which causes a compile error (becuase no setX method is created).the assignemnen must be left as is.
EB: and it must create no setters (any setterwill result in an error.)
